duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts, scheduling, and resource planning.
Develop item specific training, coordinate with program and project managers, and manage a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers.
Apply science expertise throughout item development and scoring process, including in meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate via chat, email, phone, posted reports, videoconference meetings, and in-person/virtual interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and provide expertise in Science and potentially Math assessments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
